text: Implement a distributed caching layer using Redis Cluster. Requirements: 1) Configure master-slave replication 2) Set up sentinel for automatic failover 3) Implement cache invalidation strategies 4) Add monitoring with Prometheus 5) Configure eviction policies
Design a data pipeline for real-time analytics using Apache Kafka and Apache Flink. Include stream processing, windowing operations, state management, and exactly-once semantics.
Create a comprehensive disaster recovery plan for cloud infrastructure. Cover: backup strategies, RTO/RPO requirements, failover procedures, data replication, and testing protocols.
Develop a GraphQL API with the following features: schema stitching, data loader for N+1 problem prevention, subscription support for real-time updates, and field-level authorization.
Build a monitoring and alerting system using Prometheus, Grafana, and AlertManager. Include custom metrics, SLO/SLI definitions, and runbook automation.
